name: Lombard Staked BTC
description: Lombard unlocks Bitcoinâ€™s potential as a dynamic financial tool by connecting it to the world of decentralized finance (DeFi). Its flagship product, LBTC, is the Universal Liquid Bitcoin Standard, which is yield-bearing, natively cross-chain, and backed 1:1 by BTC. LBTC empowers BTC holders to earn Babylon staking yields and actively engage in DeFi activities such as trading, borrowing, lending, yield farming, and more.
